work experience.position: MSSQL and Oracle Database Adminstration Trainee
work experience.description: In a team of three administrators, tasked with managing and ensuring that client databases are secure and upto date. Tasks include applying software patches for virtual machines and database software, ensuring high availability, performance tuning, managing database access, completing client requests and many other adhoc tasks.

education.description: WeThinkCode_is a software development training academy. Our mission is to discover the sharpest minds from underserved communities in South Africa and equip them with the skills to become excellent software developers

Tshwane University of Technology is the largest residential higher education institution in South Africa. The Electrical Engineering programme is the study and application of electricity, electronics and electromagnetism. Electrical Engineers study the uses of electricity and equipment for power generation and distribution.

Ekurhuleni West (TVET) College (EWC) is a Technical and Vocational Education and Training College. The Electrical field of study consists of two main fields, namely: Electrical Heavy Current and Light Current (also known as “Electronics”). Electricians are involved in the generation, installation, distribution and usage of electricity via electrically-operated equipment, e.g. domestic installation.
